Package org.policy.action

Interface Summary
ExecutablePackage  
 

Class Summary
AbstractExecutorWrapper  
ActionRequest A ActionRequest contains a name of function and two string arrays.
ActionResult A ActionResult contains a resultset and a flag. if this result is execution result, the flag will be set as true, otherweise be false.
JDBCWrapper The JDBCWrapper can get the data from the given data base by a SELECT-Statement in mysql form.
LDAPWrapper The LDAPWrapper can get the data from a Directory Server with use of a logical expression.
PackageRegistry  
RegExpWrapper The RegExpWrapper can get the data from the file system by use of JNDI in form of regular expressions.
Result A Result contains an array of String.
ResultSet A ResultSet contains a list of result and a array of variables.
 

Exception Summary
ActionExecutionException  
FunctionFailureException  
NoSuchFunctionException
